Package com.conductor.kafka.hadoop

Class Summary
KafkaInputFormat An InputFormat that splits up Kafka Broker-Partitions further into a set of offsets.
KafkaInputSplit An InputSplit that has a specific start and end offset in a Kafka queue Partition.
KafkaJobBuilder KafkaJobBuilder is an attempt to make Map/Reduce jobs over Kafka queues easier to configure.
KafkaRecordReader A record reader that reads a subsection, [KafkaRecordReader.getStart(), KafkaRecordReader.getEnd()), of a Kafka queue Partition.
MultipleKafkaInputFormat A InputFormat that can read any number of Kafka queues in a single Job.
MultipleKafkaInputFormat.TopicConf Represents a set of Kafka input to a Map/Reduce job, namely a topic and a Mapper.
